member.name: M:Extenso.Data.Common.DbConnectionExtensions.Insert``1(System.Data.Common.DbConnection,``0,System.String)

summary.para: Inserts the specified entity into the specified Table. Property names are used to match

member.typeparam: The type of entity to persist to Sql database.
member.param: The entity to persist to Sql database.
The table to insert the entity into.

member.name: M:Extenso.Data.Common.DbConnectionExtensions.Insert``1(System.Data.Common.DbConnection,``0,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})

summary.para: Inserts the specified entity into the specified Table. Properties are matched
with Sql Column Names by using the specified mappings dictionary.

member.typeparam: The type of entity to persist to Sql database.
member.param: The entity to persist to Sql database.
The table to insert the entity into.

param.name: mappings
param.para: A Dictionary to use to map properties to Sql columns.
Key = Property Name, Value = Sql Column Name.
